summary.span: 取得表示儲存格架構自動調整大小模式的 結構。

span.span: Gets a structure that represents the cell-based automatic sizing mode.

value.span: 表示儲存格架構自動調整大小模式的 結構。

span.span: A structure that represents the cell-based automatic sizing mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 儲存格架構自動調整大小模式大小中的資料行，不包括資料行行首儲存格的內容為基礎的資料行。The cell-based automatic sizing mode sizes columns based on the contents of cells in the column, not including column headers. 此調整大小模式會導致資料行以展開，如果內容而大於目前的資料行大小捲動檢視。This sizing mode will cause columns to expand if content that is larger than the current column size is scrolled into view. 之後的內容捲動到檢視之外，都不會壓縮資料行。The column will not shrink after the content is scrolled out of view.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property SizeToHeader As DataGridLength
public: static property System::Windows::Controls::DataGridLength SizeToHeader { System::Windows::Controls::DataGridLength get(); };

span.span: Gets a structure that represents the header-based automatic sizing mode.

value.span: 表示行首架構自動調整大小模式的 結構。

span.span: A structure that represents the header-based automatic sizing mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 行首架構自動調整大小模式大小只有資料行行首的內容為基礎的資料行。The header-based automatic sizing mode sizes columns based on the contents of column headers only.
